recipetext.li: Combine flour, baking powder, salt and butter to electric mixer and mix till it resembles fine crumbs
Add brown sugar, cinnamon, milk or cream, vanilla and honey then mix until fully incorporated
Roll out dough on lightly floured surface to one and a half inch thick Cut into small loafs and score in a cross section Bake at 220Â°C for 12-15 minutes
